Articles.Content:
This is my first Mun base. All stock parts except for MechJeb which i used to get it into orbit.

It get\'s to roughly a 140km transfer orbit then to 40km orbit around Mun, there is plenty of fuel in the base itself for steering on the way down. I only used up the 2/6 fuel tanks sense there was some fuel left in the transfer-stage for a de-orbit burn.

Downloaded!!! Awesome! Cant wait to try it out Thanks!

Cheers,

Dom
Thanks for my newest base on the moon, made it down with 5 tanks of fuel left.

Thanks for my newest base on the moon, made it down with 5 tanks of fuel left.

Awsome!

I did a crew-replace earlier, Jebediah got to go home while Bob took over.

Seeing that crew module atop that lander, I\'m reminded of the Genie\'s line from Aladdin: 'INNNFINITE COSSSMIC POWERRRRR! Teeny weeny living space!'

I love how spidery the portable base looks. It\'s all LEMmy! (I just made a new word.)

The collision mesh on the Mk2 fuel tank in the center is so large Jebediah fell through and was trapped IN THE TANK! I have since given up on him and ended his flight as I needed his piloting skills, so just a word of warning. . . WEAK COLLISION MESHES
